techmeme.title: Q&A with Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei on Anthropic's growth to ~$5B in ARR, focusing on B2B, AI talent wars, open-source models, safety regulations, and more (John Collison/Cheeky Pint)
Sen. Tom cotton sends a letter to Intel's board chair with questions about CEO Lip-Bu Tan's ties to China and subpoenas during his tenure as Cadence Design CEO (Max A. Cherney/Reuters)
Sources: the US federal judiciary's electronic case filing system was hit in a sweeping hack, potentially compromising the identities of confidential informants (Politico)
Researchers show how a weakness in OpenAI's Connectors let sensitive data be extracted from a Google Drive account using an indirect prompt injection attack (Matt Burgess/Wired)
South Korea's top trade envoy Yeo Han-koo says Samsung and SK Hynix will not be subject to 100% tariffs on US chip imports, citing the US-South Korea trade deal (Reuters)
